item.description:
THE SECRET HISTORY OF THE AMERICAN EMPIRE: Economic Hit Men, Jackals, and the Truth about Global Corruption
by, John Perkins author of Confessions of an Economic Hitman.

Come and discuss the impact Corporations, the World Bank, The International Monetary Fund, USAID have on the US Dollar and the future of the United States of America. Even if you haven't read the book. This discussion should be lively!

Refreshments will be served and its FREE!

http://www.johnperkin...

http://en.wikipedia.o...
